* Zyber heard the deadly whisper from DeathScythes voice, but somewhat 
standing her ground as he spoke.*

" Even though You are trying to kill me right at this moment..."

* Zyber jumped off to the side and backed further into the cave.*

" I could not kill you. Everything has a right to live."
